highly.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: Tom’s mother was highly critical of the school’s approach.
T.S. Eliot’s highly influential poem, ‘The Waste Land’
It’s highly unlikely that the project will be finished on time.
highly.translation[0].definitions[1].def: to a high level or standard
highly.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: She is a highly educated woman.
highly.translation[0].definitions[2].def: if you think highly of someone or something, you think they are very good and you admire them
highly.translation[0].definitions[2].exa: I’ve always thought very highly of Michael.
